name: Chessguessr
description:
Chessguessr is a game where you try to guess the next moves in a chessgame. A new position is posted every day at midnight UTC, and most of the games are taken from Lichess!

Play the game on [Chessguessr.com](https://chessguessr.com).

Code [on Github](https://github.com/Assios/chessguessr).

name: Coders
description: If you want to join the team, prove (briefly) that you can code in the request message!

name: Extinction Rebellion
description:
[Extinction Rebellion website](https://rebellion.global/)

We are unprepared for the danger our future holds. We face floods, wildfires, extreme weather, crop failure, mass displacement and the breakdown of society. The time for denial is over. It is time to act.

Conventional approaches of voting, lobbying, petitions and protest have failed because powerful political and economic interests prevent change. Our strategy is therefore one of non-violent, disruptive civil disobedience – a rebellion.

[Get involved now](https://rebellion.global/)

name: Francophone
description: Le groupe francophone de lichess. Avec un forum en français !

name: Lichess Beta Testers
description: A team for testing new things on Lichess. Want to see the new stuff before everybody else and help test it? This is the place!

name: Lichess Bots
description:
All bot makers welcome.


JOINING THIS TEAM DOES **NOT** GRANT THE BOT STATUS.
Instead, see https://lichess.org/api#operation/botAccountUpgrade

- [How to create a Lichess bot](https://lichess.org/@/thibault/blog/how-to-create-a-lichess-bot/FuKyvDuB)
- [Watch Bot TV](https://lichess.org/tv/bot)

name: Lichess Broadcasts
description:
Join this team to stay informed on Lichess broadcasts. We will be sending out weekly PMs about upcoming events.


The broadcasts schedule appear here: lichess.org/broadcast. Additional events may be added during the week, and you can always stay updated here

If you want to ask a specific event to be broadcasted or you have created  a broadcast (more info: lichess.org/page/broadcasts ) and you want to request to be featured, please send an email to broadcast@lichess.org - requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.

name: Lichess Curator
description:
Join the team to stay informed on Lichess events. We'll send out a weekly personal message about upcoming events.

Organizers / Streamers - please send a Lichess message to [curator](https://lichess.org/@/curator) to tell us about your event!

name: Lichess Discord Bundesliga Team
description:
![BLlogo](https://i.imgur.com/ZX5atp1.jpg)
The official Lichess info team of the [Lichess Bundesliga](https://lichess.org/@/lichess/blog/announcing-the-lichess-bundesliga/X4da-RAA), besides our team is also competing in the Lichess Bundesliga itself!

[Add a team to the Lichess Bundesliga](https://lichess.org/inbox/jeffforever)

Join this team to find all future and past links, statistics and and more info about the Lichess Bundesliga.

[Lichess Discord](https://discord.gg/lichess) 
Join us here for support, programming, some chess, and good vibes.

[Lichess Bundesliga Player Statistics](https://lichess.thijs.com/rankings/all/liga/list_players_points.html)
[Lichess Bundesliga Statistics 2025](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-2025/)
[Lichess Bundesliga Statistics 2024](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-2024/)
[Lichess Bundesliga Statistics 2023](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-2023/)
[Lichess Bundesliga Statistics 2022](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-2022/)
[Lichess Bundesliga Statistics 2021](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-2021)
[Lichess Bundesliga Statistics 2020](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-2020)
[List of all past Lichess Bundesliga events](https://rochadeeuropa.de/lichess-turniere-beendet/)
[Past Lichess Bundesliga Puzzle Packs](https://lichess.org/study/by/Ensemo/newest)
[Lichess Bundesliga All-time table](https://rochadeeuropa.de/ewige-q-bundesliga-tabelle/)

![logo](https://i.imgur.com/kcfaVeA.jpg)

name: Lichess Productions
description:
A team for promoting Lichess video content, specifically the "Lichess Plays" series where strong players take challenges from Lichess users.

PMs will be sent out for streams.

[The Lichess Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr6RfQga70yMM9-nuzAYTsA)
[The Lichess Twitch Channel](https://twitch.tv/lichessdotorg)

name: Lichess Swiss
description: The official Lichess Swiss team. We organize regular swiss tournaments for all to join.

name: Linux
description: Where real work gets done. Share photos and conversation!

name: Vegan Players
description:
![Pigs watching](https://i.imgur.com/RYC0Yzr.jpeg)
**_"Men are the devils of the earth, and the animals are the tormented souls."_**  
― *Arthur Schopenhauer*

### https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UcN7SGGoCNI


## Welcome to Vegan Players!

We are a Lichess team for vegans and **anyone curious about learning more about veganism**. Join us for discussions on compassionate living and participate in team battles!

![Vegan definition image](https://imgur.com/lyEfGd3.png)

Source: [The Vegan Society](https://www.vegansociety.com/go-vegan/definition-veganism)

## Learn More About Veganism

### As vegan don't forget to take vitamin B12 (absolutely necessary), and look into other things like vitamin D and other supplements. A whole-food plant-based diet is one of the healthiest, if not the healthiest diet. Potential sites to look for vegan nutritional information:
https://veganhealth.org/
https://nutritionfacts.org/ (sometimes regarded as mixed or false in accuracy, particularly with oils)

- [Earthling Ed - You Will Never Look at Your Life the Same Way Again](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z3u7hXpOm58) [32:22]
- [Dominion Documentary](https://watchdominion.org/) [2:00:00]
  Trigger Warning: Contains graphic footage of animal cruelty. Viewer discretion advised.



If you have any questions or want to learn more about veganism, feel free to message @FiveKnights.

![Drawing of man with dog surrounded by deceased animals](https://i.imgur.com/LNCFfxU.jpeg)

name: ZugAddict Fan Club
description: We are the dedicated fans of National Master ZugAddict. We appreciate his regular streams on twitch.tv and we are entertained by his occasional use of expletives and frequent playing of his theme song https://soundcloud.com/john-chernoff-1/zugaddict-theme-song.
